description:
Rimi is a mysterious pink-haired girl that Takumi encounters at the crime scene on his way home. Rimi was wearing Suimei Academy`s uniform at the time and appeared to recognise Takumi. She is Takumi`s classmate and has been his friend since their first year along with Daisuke.
Her true intention is later revealed to assist Shogun and keep an eye on Takumi`s action, making sure he doesn`t learn the truth about his identity as a delusional existence created by Shogun, the real Takumi, in order to lengthen Shogun`s life, however, this is not what Shogun wanted. Rimi calls Takumi as Taku to differentiate between the real one and the delusional one.
name: Sakihata Rimi
